name: dragon-skull
effect: Only used as a plot point; this item is given to the player and taken away in the same cutscene.
short_effect: Return to the museum in Nacrene City.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A skull of a Pokémon that was said to have braved the angry waters to fly around the world.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A skull of a Pokémon that was said to have braved the angry waters to fly around the world.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A skull of a Pokémon that was said to have braved the angry waters to fly around the world.
